name: EscapeMONO
description:
Story:
Locked rooms, strange creatures.
You know this is not a good place to stay long.
Probably it won't be too difficult to escape.
But you need to do something important before you go...

Gameplay:
This is an escape room game with black and white pixel art style.
You will be exploring in a dark laboratory.
You can point & click to find clues, pick up items, and interact with strange creatures.
Try figure out every password, unlock the doors and solve the puzzles, and find a way out.

Saving system:
The game can be saved and exited at any time from the settings menu.
Start game from beginning will clear previous progress.
Load game after ending will start from the last scene before the ending.
